title: Running Pace Calculator
description: Calculate your running pace, time, or distance
metaDescription: Free running pace calculator - Calculate your pace per kilometer or mile, estimated race time, or distance. Includes times for 5K, 10K, half marathon, and marathon.

form.title: Enter Your Data
form.modeLabel: What do you want to calculate?

info.title: About Running Pace
info.description: Running pace is the time it takes you to cover a specific unit of distance (kilometer or mile). It's an essential metric for runners looking to plan training sessions and set race goals.
info.tip: Tip: A consistent pace is key to success in long-distance races. Use this calculator to plan your race strategy and maintain a sustainable pace.
